BIO

My name is Arunesh Gautam and I am a student of B.Tech 3rd year at Bundelkhand Institute of Engineering and Technology , Jhansi. I am pursuing engineering degree in Information Technology which is well-versed with latest technologies and labs as well. I hometown is Banda Uttar Pradesh, a small city but large hospitalities like supermarkets and restaurants.
